content.en: Social media has become pervasive in modern life.
content.zh: 社交媒体已经渗透到现代生活的方方面面。

content.en: Invasive species threaten local biodiversity.
content.zh: 入侵物种威胁着当地的生物多样性。

content.en: His instructions were too vague to follow.
content.zh: 他的指示太模糊了，无法执行。

content.en: The wedding was an extravagant affair with hundreds of guests.
content.zh: 这场婚礼非常奢华，有数百位客人。

content.en: We had to wade across the shallow stream.
content.zh: 我们不得不蹚过那条浅溪。

content.en: She values honesty above all other qualities.
content.zh: 她把诚实看得比其他一切品质都重要。

content.en: Experience is the most valuable teacher.
content.zh: 经验是最宝贵的老师。

content.en: Teachers evaluate student performance throughout the semester.
content.zh: 教师在整个学期中评估学生的表现。

content.en: You need a valid passport to travel abroad.
content.zh: 出国旅行需要有效的护照。

content.en: Obesity is becoming increasingly prevalent in developed countries.
content.zh: 肥胖在发达国家越来越普遍。

content.en: The soldiers made a valiant effort to defend the city.
content.zh: 士兵们英勇地保卫城市。

content.en: She felt ambivalent about accepting the job offer.
content.zh: 她对是否接受这份工作感到矛盾。

content.en: Her advice has been invaluable throughout my career.
content.zh: 她的建议在我的整个职业生涯中都极为宝贵。

content.en: The charity gala was the biggest event of the year.
content.zh: 慈善晚会是今年最大的活动。

content.en: The annual convention attracted thousands of delegates.
content.zh: 年度大会吸引了数千名代表。

content.en: Thomas Edison invented the practical light bulb.
content.zh: 托马斯·爱迪生发明了实用的灯泡。

content.en: Vaccines help prevent the spread of disease.
content.zh: 疫苗有助于预防疾病传播。

content.en: The government decided to intervene in the crisis.
content.zh: 政府决定干预这场危机。

content.en: Hiking in the Himalayas was a great adventure.
content.zh: 在喜马拉雅山徒步是一次伟大的冒险。

content.en: The hotel is in a convenient location near the station.
content.zh: 酒店位于车站附近，位置便利。

content.en: The company reported record revenue this quarter.
content.zh: 公司本季度报告了创纪录的营收。

content.en: They tried to circumvent the regulations by using a loophole.
content.zh: 他们试图利用漏洞规避规定。

content.en: Starting a business is always a risky venture.
content.zh: 创业总是一项充满风险的事业。

content.en: The universe is constantly expanding.
content.zh: 宇宙在不断膨胀。

content.en: The city has a diverse population from many backgrounds.
content.zh: 这座城市有来自多种背景的多元化人口。

content.en: The court reversed the previous ruling.
content.zh: 法院推翻了之前的裁决。

content.en: She is a versatile musician who plays five instruments.
content.zh: 她是一位多才多艺的音乐家，能演奏五种乐器。

content.en: The policy sparked considerable controversy.
content.zh: 这项政策引发了相当大的争议。

content.en: They converted the old factory into luxury apartments.
content.zh: 他们将旧工厂改造成了豪华公寓。

content.en: We had a long conversation about our future plans.
content.zh: 我们就未来计划进行了长时间的交谈。

content.en: As an introvert, she preferred reading to parties.
content.zh: 作为一个内向的人，她更喜欢读书而非参加派对。

content.en: Extroverts tend to thrive in team environments.
content.zh: 外向的人往往在团队环境中表现出色。

content.en: Companies advertise their products on social media.
content.zh: 企业在社交媒体上为产品做广告。

content.en: The group attempted to subvert the democratic process.
content.zh: 该组织试图颠覆民主进程。

content.en: The team celebrated their victory with great joy.
content.zh: 球队欢庆胜利。

content.en: She convinced the board to approve the new plan.
content.zh: 她说服了董事会批准新计划。

content.en: The army seemed invincible after winning ten consecutive battles.
content.zh: 连续赢得十场战役后，这支军队似乎不可战胜。

content.en: The jury convicted him of fraud.
content.zh: 陪审团判定他犯有欺诈罪。

content.en: The landlord evicted the tenants for not paying rent.
content.zh: 房东因租户未交房租将其驱逐。

content.en: The charity supports victims of natural disasters.
content.zh: 该慈善机构帮助自然灾害的受害者。

content.en: Canada has ten provinces and three territories.
content.zh: 加拿大有十个省和三个地区。

content.en: The victorious team was greeted by cheering fans.
content.zh: 获胜的球队受到了欢呼球迷的迎接。

content.en: Stars are more visible on clear, dark nights.
content.zh: 在晴朗的夜晚，星星更加清晰可见。

content.en: The CEO shared her vision for the company's future.
content.zh: 首席执行官分享了她对公司未来的愿景。

content.en: The presentation included impressive visual effects.
content.zh: 演示文稿包含令人印象深刻的视觉效果。

content.en: A teacher supervises the children during recess.
content.zh: 老师在课间休息时监督孩子们。

content.en: The doctor advised him to rest for a week.
content.zh: 医生建议他休息一周。

content.en: She revised her essay before submitting it.
content.zh: 她在提交前修改了论文。

content.en: The police found evidence linking the suspect to the crime.
content.zh: 警方找到了将嫌疑人与犯罪联系起来的证据。

content.en: Television has transformed the way we receive news.
content.zh: 电视改变了我们接收新闻的方式。

content.en: She uploaded a video of her trip to the platform.
content.zh: 她将旅行视频上传到了平台上。

content.en: A recent survey showed that 70% of people support the policy.
content.zh: 最近的一项调查显示70%的人支持该政策。

content.en: She envisioned a world where everyone has equal opportunities.
content.zh: 她设想了一个人人机会均等的世界。

content.en: The musician had to improvise when she forgot the melody.
content.zh: 音乐家忘了旋律后不得不即兴发挥。

content.en: She gave a vivid description of her travels.
content.zh: 她对旅行经历做了生动的描述。

content.en: Only a few passengers survived the plane crash.
content.zh: 只有少数乘客在空难中幸存。

content.en: The doctor managed to revive the patient after cardiac arrest.
content.zh: 医生在心脏骤停后成功使患者复苏。

content.en: Clean water is vital for human survival.
content.zh: 清洁的水对人类生存至关重要。

content.en: She pursued the project with great vigor.
content.zh: 她精力充沛地推进这个项目。

content.en: Her vivacious personality made her the center of attention.
content.zh: 她活泼的个性使她成为众人关注的焦点。

content.en: The new investment helped revitalize the downtown area.
content.zh: 新投资帮助振兴了市中心区域。

content.en: Security guards remained vigilant throughout the night.
content.zh: 保安整夜保持警惕。

content.en: She raised her voice to be heard above the noise.
content.zh: 她提高声音以便在噪音中被听到。

content.en: She has been vocal about the need for reform.
content.zh: 她一直直言不讳地呼吁改革。

content.en: She advocates for equal rights in the workplace.
content.zh: 她倡导工作场所的平等权利。

content.en: His rude comments provoked an angry response.
content.zh: 他粗鲁的评论激起了愤怒的反应。

content.en: The lawyer invoked the Fifth Amendment.
content.zh: 律师援引了第五修正案。

content.en: The music evoked memories of her childhood.
content.zh: 音乐唤起了她童年的回忆。

content.en: The government revoked his driving license.
content.zh: 政府吊销了他的驾照。

content.en: Teaching was more than a job for her — it was a vocation.
content.zh: 对她来说，教书不仅是工作，更是一种使命。

content.en: The politician gave an equivocal answer to avoid controversy.
content.zh: 这位政治家给出了模棱两可的回答以避免争议。

content.en: The project involves collaboration between several departments.
content.zh: 该项目涉及多个部门之间的合作。

content.en: Languages evolve naturally over centuries.
content.zh: 语言在几个世纪中自然演变。

content.en: The Industrial Revolution transformed society.
content.zh: 工业革命改变了社会。

content.en: The Earth revolves around the Sun once a year.
content.zh: 地球每年绕太阳公转一周。

content.en: She volunteered at the local food bank every weekend.
content.zh: 她每个周末都在当地食物银行做志愿者。

content.en: Participation in the program is entirely voluntary.
content.zh: 参加该项目完全是自愿的。

content.en: Please turn down the volume on the TV.
content.zh: 请把电视音量调低。

content.en: The stock market has been extremely volatile this year.
content.zh: 今年股市极其不稳定。

content.en: The benevolent donor funded scholarships for underprivileged students.
content.zh: 仁慈的捐赠者为贫困学生资助奖学金。

content.en: Children are especially vulnerable to the effects of pollution.
content.zh: 儿童特别容易受到污染的影响。

content.en: The children were excited to visit the zoo.
content.zh: 孩子们对参观动物园感到兴奋。

content.en: She pursued a degree in zoology to study marine life.
content.zh: 她攻读动物学学位以研究海洋生物。

content.en: The zoologist spent years observing primates in the wild.
content.zh: 这位动物学家花了数年在野外观察灵长类动物。

content.en: Many cultures developed their own version of the zodiac.
content.zh: 许多文化发展出了自己版本的黄道十二宫。

content.en: The zoological survey identified three new species.
content.zh: 动物学调查发现了三个新物种。
